extension.summary: Connect Kodi to popular digital assistants
extension.description: Links Kodi to Media Steward's remote services (mediasteward.net), which allows you to command Kodi from your Google Home or Amazon Alexa. A comprehensive setup guide is available at mediasteward.net/setup. This link eliminates public exposure of Kodi's JSON RPC API by establishing a secure client connection to Media Steward's services.
extension.disclaimer: Configure your UUID by entering the activation code at mediasteward.net/activate (subscription required)
